scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-phantom && npm run test-wd
scripts.build-vendor: ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -r react -r domready -r lodash -r shifty -g uglifyify -o public/vendor.js
scripts.build-app: ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t reactify -g uglifyify -x react -x react -x domready -x lodash -x shifty -t reactify -t brfs ./node_modules/app/index.js -o public/app.js
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-vendor
scripts.dev: npm run build-vendor && ./node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js -x react -x domready -x lodash -x shifty -t reactify -t brfs ./node_modules/app/index.js -o public/app.js
